infos.info: This series had a long pre- and post-history. It grew out of an AMA educational format begun on NBC in 1935.

prints.title: RADIO PROGRAMS SCHEDULED FOR THE CURRENT WEEK New York
On the Air : The Encyclopedia of Old-Time Radio
prints.author: Dunning, John

synopses.synopsis: Doctors at War was a joint project of NBC, the American Medical Association, and the Armed Forces. Its purpose was to give the public an idea of what the nation's physicians were contributing to the war effort... - On the Air: The Encyclopedia of Old-Time Radio by John Dunning
